titleStmt.title: A meditacion vpon the Lordes prayer, made by Thomas Leuer, at Sayncte Mary Wol Churche in London. Anno. M.D.LI.
titleStmt.author: Lever, Thomas, 1521-1577.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Jhon Daye, dwelling ouer Aldersgate beneth Sainte Martins,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
